nodes.documentation:
these functions to check status of bounty and submission. used more by tests
they will be deleted in the future
no need to expose internal state
nodes.name: isOpen

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (string memory,uint256,address,uint256,uint256[] memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (string memory,uint256,address,uint256,uint256[] memory)

accept(uint256).details: it uses inherited simple bank to manager payments

params.submissionId: id of submission to be accepted

params._reward: reward to who gonna resolve it. must be gt zero and lt msg.value

add(string,uint256).return: the bounty id to be used in further interactions.

params._admin: address of new admin to be added

params.bountyId: id of bounty to get closed

deposit().return: The balance of the user after the deposit is made

params.user: address of user to be checked

reject(uint256).details: it uses inherited simple bank to manager payments

params.submissionId: id of submission to be rejected

params._admin: address of admin to be removed

submit(uint256,string).return: the id of the created submission

withdraw(uint256).details: This does not return any excess ether sent to it
withdraw(uint256).return: The balance remaining for the user

addAdmin(address).notice: Add new admin. only admin can call it

enroll().notice: Enroll should not be supported. Better to use a new base class that only allow withdraw if have time.

isOpen(uint256).notice: these functions to check status of bounty and submission. used more by tests they will be deleted in the future no need to expose internal state

listMyBounties().notice: List all bounties listed by sender

listMySubmissions().notice: List all submissions listed by sender

removeAdmin(address).notice: Remove existing admin. only owner can call it

submit(uint256,string).notice: Add new submission to existing bounty
